name: Real Robot Wrestling City Batt
description:
Real Robot Wrestling City Battle is the immortal superhero champions fight you will fight as the superhero city street crime fighter to experience the attack and action games. It’s about futuristic war games where you are going to experience best boxing skills for example kung Fu, martial arts and karate in fighting ring arena.
Features:
•Amazing Graphics
• Realistic arena ring battle.
• Real gameplay of fighting.
• Use multiple kung fu fighting styles .
• Karate death battlefield.
